If File Exists: With this action you can check to see if a file with the given name exists. You select the file to check for (as a sting and including the extension) and the function will return true if it exists, and false if it does not. Note that this will return true if the file exists in the game bundle as an Included File or if the file has been saved out while the game was running (see the section on The File System for more information).
